subject: URGENT: Account lockout after multiple failed MFA attempts
body: User account locked after 5 consecutive failed MFA attempts from unrecognized device. Employee cannot access payroll system to process end-of-month payments. Last successful login was 2 hours ago from corporate IP.

subject: CRITICAL: Complete database outage in us-east-1 region
body: Primary production database cluster unresponsive. All application services returning 503 errors. Customer-facing applications completely down. Revenue impact estimated at $15k/hour. Issue began at 09:15 EST during routine maintenance window.

subject: Billing discrepancy - duplicate charges on enterprise plan
body: Monthly invoice shows duplicate line items for premium support. Charged $24,000 instead of $12,000. Accounting department requires resolution before month-end closing tomorrow.

subject: VPN instability during peak business hours
body: VPN connections dropping consistently between 9-11 AM daily. Remote employees cannot maintain stable connections for more than 10 minutes. Issue affects 45+ sales team members working from home.

subject: API gateway returning 502 Bad Gateway errors
body: API gateway health checks failing. 40% of API requests returning 502 errors. Load balancer shows 3/5 backend instances unhealthy. Issue started after latest deployment (v2.8.1).

subject: File upload functionality broken in production
body: Customer file uploader stuck at processing state. Files over 50MB fail with 'network error' message. Browser console shows CORS policy violations. Issue affects all new customer onboarding.

subject: SECURITY: Suspicious admin account activity detected
body: Security monitoring flagged unusual login patterns for service admin account. Multiple authentication attempts from international IPs (Germany, Singapore). Account typically only accessed from corporate network.

subject: Database connection pool exhaustion errors
body: Application logs show 'Too many connections' errors during peak load. MySQL connection pool (max_connections=500) consistently hitting limit. Query performance degraded by 300%.

subject: Emergency MFA reset required - device lost
body: Employee lost phone with Authenticator app. Needs immediate MFA reset to access production deployment systems for critical hotfix deployment scheduled in 2 hours.

subject: SSL certificate renewal required - expires in 48 hours
body: Monitoring alert: Wildcard SSL certificate for *.company.com expires 2025-11-22 08:00 UTC. Automatic renewal failed due to DNS validation issues. Urgent manual renewal required.

subject: Performance degradation in search functionality
body: Customer reporting 3-4 second delays in product search results. Average response time increased from 250ms to 3200ms. Elasticsearch cluster showing high CPU utilization.

subject: Data export missing recent transaction records
body: Customer reporting CSV data exports missing all transactions from last 45 days. Export process completes successfully but output file contains incomplete data. Issue started after database migration last weekend.

subject: Mobile app crash on iOS 18.1 launch
body: App crashes immediately on startup for all users updating to iOS 18.1. Crash analytics show memory access violation in payment processing module. Affecting 100% of iOS 18.1 users.

subject: Email delivery failures - high bounce rate
body: Transactional email system showing 45% bounce rate for outgoing messages. DMARC authentication failures reported across multiple domains. Customer notification system impacted.

subject: Incorrect user permissions after team transfer
body: User transferred from Marketing to Finance team but still has marketing-specific permissions. RBAC system not updating group membership automatically. User cannot access required financial reports.

subject: CDN cache serving outdated JavaScript assets
body: Static assets (main.js, styles.css) not updating globally after deployment. Some regions receiving 8-hour old cached versions despite multiple cache purge requests. Affecting new feature rollout.

subject: SOX compliance audit - user access logs required
body: External auditors requesting complete user data access logs for Q3 2025. Need export of all authentication events, data queries, and permission changes for SOX compliance certification due in 5 business days.

subject: Salesforce integration webhook timeouts
body: Salesforce-to-CRM webhook integration timing out after 12 seconds. Payload processing exceeds timeout limit, causing lead synchronization failures. 350+ leads stuck in pending sync status.

subject: Memory leak in background job processors
body: Worker nodes memory consumption growing 3GB/hour until out-of-memory killer terminates processes. Pattern matches image processing jobs. Requires restart every 6 hours to prevent cluster-wide impact.

subject: Feature request: Bulk user management API
body: Requesting new REST API endpoints for bulk user operations. Currently limited to single-user operations in admin panel. Need endpoints for: bulk create, bulk update, bulk permission assignment to support enterprise onboarding workflows.
